text: Why would anybody want their dog to snore?

name: moraiat
text: A comment left by moraiat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, Art-Vader, nutmeg, alcxxk, Fathington, Madoushi, Nictusempra)

name: professoryes
text:
It's the fellow from the NASTY DIVORCE section in the personals. He wants the dog to snore to get back at her.

He is NASTY, after all.

name: gussiejives
text: What, yours doesn't?

name: carlyle
text: I think it says "Can you teach my dog how to musically snore?"

name: philophobe
text: Don't judge Steve; you've not had his life.

name: howard
text: A comment left by howard was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ohmygooses, pulkbaby, Nictusempra)

name: zem
text: A comment left by zem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, Connellingus, Nictusempra)

name: nocarsgo
text: Someone is paying someone else to steal a VW. The way Lyle holds his booze in panel 5 looks ill.

name: audhumla
text: He cradles it such as one would an infant child

name: tommythebrat
text: =When I say that they were paying someone else to steal a VW was "Oh man, I bet either Lyle or Todd put that up there." and then I realised they are right there....so they probably didn't.

name: st-elmos_fire
text: why can't someone read a paper in which they placed a personal add? It seems very much like something they would do.

name: tommythebrat
text: Fine! You caught me! I have never read a newspaper before! way to rub it in hotshot!

name: dusty
text: People just don't consider the feelings of those of us who cannot read or write. I feel your pain my friend.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, Deusoma, Connellingus, Art-Vader, Nictusempra)

name: jesler729
text: Appearently 50 dollars is the going price if you want to get something done.

name: quazifuji
text: The question "Do you want $50?" may be rhetorical, as the last job appears to pay $100. At least, something happens with $100.

name: fermatprime
text: I assumed it was the phone number. xxx-5100.

name: shutup_shutup
text: $50 is class money.

name: lexsenthur
text: No, it's classified money.

name: kazad
text: A comment left by kazad was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by _cheesekayke, Siah, Nictusempra)

name: _cheesekayke
text: Maslow Agency is too classy a name for such as a prostitution recruitment center.

name: professoryes
text: Or, perhaps, just classy enough.

name: philophobe
text: Maslow's Hierarchy of Ruined Lives.

name: winkmartindale
text: All and all, not a bad job.  The trick is loving your work.

name: banzairabbit
text: "Trick" being the key word.

name: clever-nickname
text: I just realized that Lyle smacked Todd in panel five.

name: johnmatrix
text: What I like is that they probably aren't insulting each other. That's just how two drinkers greet one another.

name: spinynorman
text: That's more like how two guys greet one another. But then again most "guys" are considered drinkers.

name: helloftubby
text: yeah i tend to greet my close friends with 'alright you cunt?'

name: bourbonsamurai
text: I am currently unemployed, and have sent this strip to all my friends as an example of the kind of help they can give me.

name: dasilodavi
text: There are times in my life when I would seriously consider this job.  Now is one of those times.

name: spinynorman
text: Props for "can you teach my dog how to snore." I missed that previously.

name: spinynorman
text: Man, I know that I'm double posting months apart, but you should never consider an ad where the description "fully healed" is a positive boon. Jesus mary and fuck.

name: gussiejives
text: Snore lessons don't come cheap!

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs

Roast Beef: bad weekend
Lyle: Sunday, April 24, 2005

Today's Blogs

Philippe: Nobody died.

name: xiaomimi
text: Dang man screwed up Lyle's title, it's supposed to be "tranny fux."

name: i_love_kate
text: I have seen the result of Philippe trying to use a semi-colon. Now I can die.

name: nyu
text: I didnt know the acheworld had craigslist

name: direhaggis
text: There is a surfeit of fully healed transexuals who need to get laid by dudes like Lyle.

name: pogo
text: So far all of you have missed the reference to Maslow.

name: boredom_man
text: Damn, I straight-up did. Hang my head in shame, I will. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maslow%27s_hierarchy_of_needs will point Firefox to the link you posted.

name: genequagmire
text: False, but OK.  Maybe that was true as of one year ago.

name: i_love_kate
text: I would hate to be the one to have to wake up Jesus on Christmas day.

name: woodenteeth
text: ... would he be angry with you?

name: boswelljn
text: I imagine this strip taking place at about 9 o'clock in the morning. And both Todd and Lyle are drinking.

name: cycerin
text: This strip made me appreciate Lyle

name: sp1derbaby
text: Are you a recent M2F transsexual who wishes to be sexually active and confident in your new body but not looking for a long-term relationship? Are you fully healed?

text: The expression on Todd's face in panel two is perfect!

text: I really don't like how Lyle knocks Todd aside there. No one should ever disrespect Todd like that, not even Lyle.

text: todd has earned at least that
